  • Constructor Details

    • Account

      public Account​(String username, String email, String firstName, String lastName, Session currentSession, ArrayList<String> knownIPs)
      Instantiates a new Account with the given credentials
      Parameters:
      username - the username for the account to be created
      email - the email for the account to be created
      firstName - the first name of the user
      lastName - the last name of the user
      currentSession - the current session that the user is in
      knownIPs - the known IP addresses of the user (for session keepalive)

  • Method Details

    • createPassword

      public void createPassword​(String hashedPass)
      Creates a doubly-hashed password for the user. Hashes with a salt for extra security.
      Parameters:
      hashedPass - the pre-hashed password sent by the client

    • getUsername

      public String getUsername()
      Gets the username of the Account
      Returns:
      account username

    • getEmail

      public String getEmail()
      Gets the email of the Account
      Returns:
      account email

    • getFirstName

      public String getFirstName()
      Gets the first name set on the Account
      Returns:
      first name of account user

    • getLastName

      public String getLastName()
      Gets the last name set on the Account
      Returns:
      last name of account user

    • getKnownIPs

      public ArrayList<String> getKnownIPs()
      Gets the array of known IP addresses for the Account's previous logins
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Strings containing the known IPs

    • checkPassword

      public boolean checkPassword​(String password)
      Checks if the given password is the correct password for the user's account.
      Parameters:
      password - the password that the user has provided
      Returns:
      false if password is incorrect, otherwise true

    • getSession

      public Session getSession()
      Gets the current Session that the user is in, if any
      Returns:
      current Session if in one, otherwise null

    • joinSession

      public void joinSession​(Session session)
      Adds the user to a given Session
      Parameters:
      session - the session that the user is being added to

    • leaveSession

      public void leaveSession()
      Removes the user from their current Session

    • createSession

      public Session createSession()
      Creates a new Session under the user's account, setting them as the host
      Returns:
      the Session that was created

    • isSessionHost

      public boolean isSessionHost()
      Simpler way of returning if the current Account is the host of a Session. Pointless to be used anywhere other than Account#isSessionHost() as a direct reference; it is accessible from Session#getHostUser but obviously that is pointless
      Returns:
      true if user is host, otherwise false

    • createSpotifyUser

      public URI createSpotifyUser()
      Creates a new instance of SpotifyUser to add the user's Spotify account
      Returns:
      the user URI of the Spotify account

    • refreshSpotifyAccess

      public boolean refreshSpotifyAccess​(String refreshToken)
      Creates a new instance of SpotifyUser if one does not exist that is linked to this Account, otherwise it will refresh the preexisting one. Used to refresh access upon a request being denied or when a client reconnects and transmits a refresh token.
      Parameters:
      refreshToken - the token to be used to refresh access
      Returns:
      true if successful, otherwise false

    • createDeezerUser

      public void createDeezerUser()
      Creates a new instance of DeezerUser to add the user's Deezer account

    • getSpotifyUser

      public SpotifyUser getSpotifyUser()
      Gets the user's SpotifyUser instance
      Returns:
      SpotifyUser instance, null if none set

    • getDeezerUser

      public DeezerUser getDeezerUser()
      Gets the user's DeezerUser
      Returns:
      DeezerUser instance, null if none set
